localised_description: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you won't lose hundreds battles.
The roar of the tyrant makes even the weakest soldier as hard as a stone.
The first thing to do is to confront the enemy. Think later.
Diao Chan knows how to encourage frightened warriors and lead them to battle.
Lu Zheng never misses the prey.
Xun Yu's firm, unbroken will is an example to all soldiers.
Wen Chou drives his men without mercy, but he knows it's effective.
Protect me, even if you have to sacrifice your life.
Yijin Liting is a relentless and persistent opponent
Once targeted, the enemy cannot escape from Yijin Liting
Even the strongest of warriors are rendered temporarily immobile when struck at a pressure point
Poison is a vile but effective method of assasination
Evil acts also require a high level of intellect to maximize efficiency
Li Ru is able to accurately predict the outcome of events. How unfortunate that his master does not listen
Zhou Tu/Beng are witnesses to how power has steadily corrupted her former friend, Zheng Jiang
These sisters have pledged to live, fight, and die together
A genius fighter since birth, nobody could surpass Lu Ji's martial prowess
Like father, like daughter; Lu Ji has an incontrollable temper
Lu Ji's bravery and beauty inspires the troops
Lady Trieu fights for freedom
With the hope of her people bearing on her shoulder, Lady Trieu must fight thrice as hard
Lady Trieu is worshipped as a goddess
A true guardian always protects his people
Luo Jun cannot stand breathing the same air as those treachorous rebels
Luo Jun has survived several assassination attempts
Who dares to challenge the two dragons of battle?
Yan Xiang's advice may not be enticing, but is always proven to be correct
Yan Xiang calculates the perfect timing for attack
The lady's earnest consolation adds strength to the troops
Hu Jinting's elegance and culture is unparalleled
Who can defend against that which he cannot see?
There are rumors of a man with incredible strength from Yangan...
Such boundless gifts from the forest does not come often
Huang Zu is famed for defeating the tiger of Jiangdong
Against all adversity, Huang Zu fights on
